decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (Design and Access Statement and drawing 1030/OS Map, 1030/Block Plan, 1030/01/0, 1030/01/1, 1030/01/2, 1030/01/3, 1030/01/4, 1030/01/5, 1030/01/6, 1030/01/7, 1030/01/8, 1030/01/9, and 1030/01/10 received: 30/11/2017) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.

Condition : 4 - The outbuilding building hereby permitted shall not be occupied at any time other than for purposes incidental to the residential use of the dwelling known as Flat 1, 15 Harvard Road. For the avoidance of doubt the building shall not be used as a living room, bedroom, kitchen or as a separate unit of accommodation.

Condition : 5 - No additional windows or other glazed openings shall be formed in the flank walls of the proposal hereby approved and no additional doors inserted in the building without the prior written consent of the Local Planning Authority.
description: Erection of a single storey side infill extension and erection of an outbuilding in rear garden
